scripts.serve: npm run build && npm run start
scripts.db:create: npm run typeorm:config:build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/dist/cli/index.js db:create --config ormconfig.json
scripts.db:drop: npm run typeorm:config:build && ts-node ./node_modules/typeorm-extension/dist/cli/index.js db:drop --config ormconfig.json
scripts.typeorm: npm run typeorm:config:build && node --require ts-node/register ./node_modules/typeorm/cli.js --config ormconfig.json
scripts.db:fresh: npm run db:drop && npm run db:create && npm run seed:run
